comment.author: 39745317@N07
comment._content:
Airplanes for Animosity-Free Living fill the sky
as I look into a life alleviating I

Someone wants to give me strife?
FU mr magoo for pooing on my parade of hopefulness

you can't crush my hope for humanity

I'll find you a new place for human dignity....

~Museum Appreciator from Michoacon
